alert.note: Alert for Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 28 at 6:35AM AKST until January 30 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations 2 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. Visibility one quarter mile or less possible. wind chills to 60 below possible * WHERE...Eastern Beaufort Sea Coast. * WHEN...From Monday morning through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on difficult travel conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low 60 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 5 minutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
